column4: ok  Im the linux newbe.   I have Ubuntu 10.04 on my box right now  do I have to download the new version and put it on a disk to up grade to the newer version?
you can upgrade over the internet
if you want to upgrade, run the Update Manager and change the setting to "normal" instead of "long term support"
then run Alt-F2 "update-manager -c" to actually upgrade
